content.question: Over the course of the nineteenth century, the risks associated with financing the trading voyages of European ships would

choices.label: decrease, as steamships offered a more reliable and safer method of oceanic transportation
increase, as Asian navies became more of a threat to European navies
increase, as the rise of new colonial powers such as Italy and Germany threatened international trade
decrease, as international organizations succeeded in eliminating almost all piracy

content.answer: decrease, as steamships offered a more reliable and safer method of oceanic transportation
